医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，收入不平等与预期寿命 10 年差距有关过去40年来，美国贫富之间的健康、死亡率以及收入差距持续扩大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Income-inequality-linked-to-10-year-gap-in-life-expectancy-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Income-inequality-linked-to-10-year-gap-in-life-expectancy-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c00045e8-a315-44b1-b590-5254167007df Thu, 02 May 2024 14:17:39 -0400 Income inequality linked to 10-year gap in life expectancy, study reveals
AI 模型模仿随机临床试验来确定最佳的中风预防治疗科学家设计了一种新的人工智能模型，可以模拟随机临床试验，以确定最有效预防心脏病患者中风的治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/AI-model-mimics-randomized-clinical-trials-for-确定-optimal-中风-预防-治疗.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/AI-model-mimics-randomized-clinical-trials-for-确定-optimal-中风-预防-治疗.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33cf6d5e-8eb6-4b7b-917e-3836018212a3 Thu, 02 May 2024 14:11:21 -0400 AI model mimics randomized clinical trials for determining optimal stroke prevention treatment
新疫苗方法有望针对流感病毒变异较小的区域杜克大学的研究人员开发了一种疫苗，鼓励免疫系统针对病毒表面变化较小的部分，为攻击流感病毒开辟了一条新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-vaccine-approach-shows-promise-in-targeting-less-variable-region-of-influenza-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/New-vaccine-approach-shows-promise-in-targeting-less-variable-region-of-influenza-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=970513d1-c02b-4ca6-908e-428b79de1481 Thu, 02 May 2024 13:53:18 -0400 New vaccine approach shows promise in targeting less variable region of influenza virus
研究揭示运动导致 19 个器官发生分子变化运动对健康的好处众所周知，但新的研究表明，身体对运动的反应比以前想象的更加复杂和深远。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-reveals-molecular-changes-in-19-organs-due-to-exercise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-reveals-molecular-changes-in-19-organs-due-to-exercise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01e9c349-d95a-4a19-9cf4-414398b3dcdb Thu, 02 May 2024 13:25:21 -0400 Study reveals molecular changes in 19 organs due to exercise
研究显示，前半段睡眠期间脑细胞连接减弱伦敦大学学院科学家对鱼类进行的一项新研究表明，在睡眠期间，大脑会削弱清醒时形成的神经元之间的新连接，但仅限于前半夜的睡眠期间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Brain-cell-connections-weakened-during-first-half-of-sleep-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Brain-cell-connections-weakened-during-first-half-of-sleep-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9919900-7264-4289-a372-00295070034b Thu, 02 May 2024 13:00:37 -0400 Brain cell connections weakened during first half of sleep, study reveals
雷帕霉素有望减缓与癫痫发作相关的阿尔茨海默病进展增加脑细胞兴奋性的蛋白质失衡可能解释了为什么患有阿尔茨海默病（AD）且经历过癫痫发作的人比没有经历过癫痫发作的人表现出更快的认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Rapamycin-shows-promise-in-slowing-Alzheimers-disease-progression-linked-to-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Rapamycin-shows-promise-in-slowing-Alzheimers-disease-progression-linked-to-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed8962f1-06d1-4377-b075-02c4d426d275 Thu, 02 May 2024 12:37:19 -0400 Rapamycin shows promise in slowing Alzheimer's disease progression linked to seizures
昆士兰大学的研究发现了帮助将药物输送到大脑的分子途径昆士兰大学的一位研究人员发现了分子通道，可用于帮助将药物输送到大脑中以治疗神经系统疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/UQ-research-finds-molecular-doorways-to-help-deliver-drugs-into-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/UQ-research-finds-molecular-doorways-to-help-deliver-drugs-into-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=785f941a-b70e-4e13-884d-b7a455f9810a Thu, 02 May 2024 10:42:01 -0400 UQ research finds molecular doorways to help deliver drugs into the brain
哥伦比亚研究人员发现大脑控制炎症的能力哥伦比亚大学祖克曼研究所的研究人员对小鼠进行的一项新研究表明，大脑可以将免疫系统引导到意想不到的程度，能够检测、增强和抑制炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Columbia-researchers-uncover-brains-ability-to-control-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Columbia-researchers-uncover-brains-ability-to-control-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c5441c9-2aa9-4c67-b061-288ccd415508 Thu, 02 May 2024 10:36:30 -0400 Columbia researchers uncover brain's ability to control inflammation
研究发现与儿童肥胖密切相关的因果遗传变异费城儿童医院 (CHOP) 的研究人员发现了一种与儿童肥胖密切相关的致病基因变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-uncovers-causal-genic-variant-strongly-linked-with-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Study-uncovers-causal-genic-variant-strongly-linked-with-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=476d5b29-4665-4cb0-9beb-29307422cc70 Thu, 02 May 2024 10:27:00 -0400 Study uncovers causal genetic variant strongly associated with childhood obesity
虚拟现实：一种有前途的青少年减压工具社交媒体。气候危机。政治两极分化。大流行和在线学习的喧嚣。今天的青少年面临着前所未有的压力，在过去十年中，他们的心理健康状况持续下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Virtual-reality-A-promising-tool-for-teen-stress-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Virtual-reality-A-promising-tool-for-teen-stress-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f55fe2c-690a-4a91-aa8d-761eaa21750e Thu, 02 May 2024 10:22:50 -0400 Virtual reality: A promising tool for teen stress reduction
